materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"76nvh","text":" 
Vortex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qhjq","text":"  
Tabletop centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iplk","text":"      
Biomasher II Tube/Pest, Sterile – KIMBLE (Cat #9749625002) – for homogenization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acplb","text":"    
Biomasher II homogenization pestles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9384m","text":"
ThermoScientific 1.5ml microtube WX und MX (Cat #314352H01) – For ultracentrifugation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s8ql","text":"  
Pipettes, pipette tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kq5j","text":"      
1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gvjp","text":"     
Waste bucket and bag","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ugge","text":"  
Gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a3m6","text":"
Thin marker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55gl6","text":" 
Dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1flmc","text":"    
Ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m83d","text":"
Metal tube rack for ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"djnvf","text":"Collect 20-40 fly heads via Snap Freeze method into a Biomasher tube and transfer tubes to CTRND on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duh1i","text":"Turn on Sorvall ultracentrifuge and set temperature to 4degC, place rotor inside and turn on vacuum to allow internal temperature to set.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed97a","text":"Add 50uL (2.5uL/fly head) of 1% TritonX-100 with PPI to heads in Biomasher II tube and homogenize for 1.5 min with a hand-held automatic homogenizer and Biomasher pestles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5dpim","text":"Briefly spin down in tabletop centrifuge to get the liquid to the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8d3pq","text":"Sonicate at 35% with 5 one-second pulses for tissue to break down/dissolve. Skip this step for ‘non-sonicated’ extractions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eel4f","text":"Clarify by centrifugation in a tabletop centrifuge (2,100g) for 15 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m6l7","text":"Move entire liquid sample into ThermoScientific    1.5ml microtube WX und MX (Cat #314352H01) before centrifuging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckeom","text":"Centrifuge the supernatant at 100,000 g (29,900 rpm) for 30 min at 4°C using the chilled rotor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ledq","text":"Remove and save Supernatant into new labeled collection Eppendorf (soluble fraction).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57lo3","text":"Wash the pellet by adding 50uL of TritonX-100 with PPI and centrifuging at 100,000 g for 15 min at 4°C. Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nu9q","text":"Resuspend pellet in 50ul (2.5ul/fly head) in TritonX-100 with PPI by sonication with 3 one-second pulses or until it is fully resuspended. Label and save (insoluble fraction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mso2","text":"Perform BCA. If strapped on time, samples can wait to be quantified and stored at -80C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ak5ui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd11b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b7d8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ulam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5heq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8hc7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kof","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6es4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f441j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mruk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nj8m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7m2e4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fband","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e58lr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67tf1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["Stock Solutions","Formula","Storage"],["TBS","20 mM Tris Base, 150mM NaCl, pH 7.6","4C"],["10X PhosphoStop","1ml of MilliQ; 1 tablet: PhosphoStop","-20C"],["10X cOmplete","1ml of MilliQ; 1 tablet: cOmpleteMini","-20C"]],"guid":"BFA2014F32324A4E846EF6109F0A7DA3","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Stock Solutions","Formula","Storage"],["TBS","20 mM Tris Base, 150mM NaCl, pH 7.6","4C"],["10X PhosphoStop","1ml of MilliQ; 0.0008g NaF

ice","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["1% TritonX-100 (1mL)","800uL TBS, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop, 10ul TritonX-1001% TritonX-100 (1mL)	800uL TBS, 100uL 10X cOmplete, 100uL 10X PhosphoStop, 10ul TritonX-100
